name: Tree GROWTH 3/4 Shirt
description:
SPECS
• Printed on American Apparel t-shirts 
• 100% Fine Jersey cotton, combed for softness and comfort 
• Flattering, stylish fit on virtually any body type

SIZES
• Available in S,M,L,XL and XXL

COLORS
• Black/ White 


THE STORY BEHIND THE LOGO
This Shirt represents the ups and downs we go through life, the good times and the bad. But in the end they all lead to our personal growth in life making us stronger and better as we gain more wisdom and experience. Like a tree that goes through the down cycle of winter leaving growth rings that show how many cold winters it’s made it through as it continues to grow and get stronger every year.

name: Original Sprocket Guard
description:
SPECS
•	Works with Tree Original Sprockets only
•	1/4" thick 7075 T6 CNC machined aluminum
•	Radiused grind edge
•	10mm bolts w/ 6mm hex key hole
SIZES
•	25T, 28T, or 30T
COLORS 
•	Black
WEIGHT
•	25t 2.3oz/63g 
•	28t 2.5oz/70g
•	30t 2.6oz/72g
WHY MAKE THIS PART?
To protect your chain during sprocket tricks.

HOW IS THIS PART DESIGNED SO THAT IT SOLVES THOSE ISSUES? 
AND WHAT OTHER IMPOVEMENTS HAVE BEEN MADE? 
It is made of 1/4" thick 7075 t6 aluminum that will hold up to anything you can dish out. 
Uses heat treated steel 10mm bolts w/ 6mm hex key hole to attach directly to Tree original sprockets. 


-Sam Schulte Designer/Owner

name: Tree Headset
description: Tree Bicycle co sealed integrated headset bearings

name: Canopy Stem
description:
SPECS
•	Made of 6061 T6 CNC machined aluminum 
•	smooth and compact design
•	internally machined 
•	solid clamp bolts that use a 6mm hex key

SIZE
•	Length 53mm
•	Rise: 35mm
•	Stack height 30.5mm

COLORS 
•	Black, Blue, Red, Gold, or Silver

WEIGHT
•	10.7oz


WHY MAKE THIS PART?
This stem was designed to offer a straight forward stem that doesn’t look like Swiss cheese. And a lot of top load stems out there have a machined hole between the handlebar clamp bolts that can cause the stem to break off.

   
HOW IS THIS PART DESIGNED SO THAT IT SOLVES THOSE ISSUES? 
AND WHAT OTHER IMPROVEMENTS HAVE BEEN MADE? 

I designed this stem on 3D software with finite element analysis. 
Instead of machined externally, the stem is internally machined to remove all unnecessary material. This creates a stronger stem.
Material was left in the stem at the most important location for a topload stem. And that is between the handlebar clamp bolts. I’ve seen too many toploads stems break clean off because too much material was taken away from this area. 
All six bolts are heatreated steel with ED black finish and are not hollow for strength. 
The stem is smooth and radiused on all sides for a knee friendly and elegant look. 

-Sam Schulte Designer/Owner

name: Timber Stem
description:
SPECS
•	Design to be used flipped up or flipped down
•	Made of 6061 T6 CNC machined aluminum 
•	smooth and compact design
•	internally machined 
•	solid clamp bolts that use a 6mm hex key

SIZE
•	Length 53mm
•	Rise: 7mm flipped down
•	Rise: 24mm flipped up
•	Stack height 31mm

COLORS 
•	Black, Blue, Red, Gold, or Silver 

WEIGHT
•	9.9oz


WHY MAKE THIS PART?
We wanted a front load stem that can look good both flipped up and flipped down. And is a straight forward stem that doesn’t look like Swiss cheese.  


HOW IS THIS PART DESIGNED SO THAT IT SOLVES THOSE ISSUES? 
AND WHAT OTHER IMPROVEMENTS HAVE BEEN MADE? 

The stem can be used as a mid-rise stem by running it slipped up. The stem was designed with the purpose of looking good whether flipped up or down. 
I designed this stem on 3D software with finite element analysis. 
Instead of machined externally, the stem is internally machined to remove all unnecessary material. This creates a stronger stem.
All six bolts are heatreated steel with ED black finish and are not hollow for strength. 
The stem is smooth and radiused on all sides for a knee friendly and elegant look. 

-Sam Schulte Designer/Owner

name: Tree New England Roast DVD
description:
Brian Yeagle, Clint Reynolds, Timmy Theus, and Tree owner Sam Schulte take a trip throughout the Northeast and ride everything from the world famous Catty Woods, to New England street, to shop stops and local parks. they visit Clint's parents home in New Hampshire and camp in the White mountains. 

27 minutes

name: Tree SB Power Cable
description:
•	Brass barrel that prevents wire twist and increases pulling power 
•	1.5mm pre-stretched Teflon coated inner wire 
•	Teflon lined housing with Kevlar fiber wrap
•	CNC machined 6061 T6 Aluminum ferrules 
•	Can also be used as a lower gyro cable 

SIZES
•	44” long housing. Is the Perfect length and can be put straight on your bike without the need to cut it down, it is long enough to comfortably do one full barspin even with up to 10” bars.

•	50” long housing. This is “normal” housing length and can be cut down to your preferred length if you want a longer cable.
 
COLORS 
•	Black

name: Tree Script Hoody
description:
SPECS
•	Printed on High quality pullover Beimar Hoodie
•	80% cotton/ 20% polyester
•	Low profile pocket design
•	Flattering, stylish fit on virtually any body type

SIZES

• Available in S,M,L,XL, and XXL

COLORS

• Black / Charcoal striped


THE STORY BEHIND THE LOGO

The Script hoodie is just a simple and clean design on a nice looking hoodie that will keep you warm all through the winter.

name: Tree Super Moto Bar
description: We made the Moto bars because we wanted an all around bar with the more classic styling of bigger boxed bars that could handle the abuse of street, the boost of the trails, and anything in between. We made these bars with the same sweep options as all of our previous handlebars, but with three different height and width options so you can find the ones that best fit your set up in todays world of growing bar sizes and refined set ups. Why it was made this way: Whether you want to stack your bar height to the moon, or want to maintain your current height but loose the spacers for a cleaner looking set up we make four sizes of the Moto bars to fit your needs. The bars are also wider as they grow taller to meet the needs for wider bars which provide more stability and leverage. The bigger box shape like their name pays homage to the large box styles of BMX bars early on. While the box shape is larger, we managed to maintain our signature large radius bends, which have been present since our first set of Hot Bars in 2005; these larger radius bends add to the over all strength of the bar. Specs: -11 butted -Made of post weld heat treated chromoly -Threaded for use with Tree bar ends, but works with any bar end Sizes: - 10" Tall x 30.5" wide - 12˚ backsweep - 1˚ or 4˚ upsweep Color: Black or Matte Clear

name: Sun Rims
description: Lace your Tree hubs up to some of the best rims in the business! Choose which Sun Rim you want to complete your set up and we'll lace it up in house free of charge!

name: Spokes
description:
Straight pull spokes to complete your wheel.
Choose the type of spoke you'd like and we'll figure the size necessary to build your wheel!

options.name: Black Straight Gauge Straight Pull Spokes
Silver Straight Gauge Straight Pull Spokes

name: Tree 10, 11,12 and 13t Thread on cogs
description: More versatility for your race hub! Now you can choose to switch up your gearing by replacing the stock 16t cog with an 11, 12 or 13 tooth cog

name: Tree Seat Post Clamp Bolt
description:
This bolt has a 6mm hex key hole instead of the common 5mm hex hole bolt so now it takes even fewer tools to break your bike down.

The bolt comes with a nut as well due to the fact that sometimes the stock nuts get stripped out.

Comes with a laser etched Tree logo for 5 cool points! Redeemable at a street spot near you.

description:
SPECS

• 50% Fine Jersey cotton 50% polyester, combed for softness and comfort
• Flattering, stylish fit on virtually any body type

SIZES

THE STORY BEHIND THE LOGO

SPECS

• Flattering, stylish fit on virtually any body type

SIZES

THE STORY BEHIND THE LOGO

Even if you have been told there is only so many ways possible…..there’s still another way.

name: Tree ORIGINAL T-Shirt
description:
SPECS

• Printed on Next Level t-shirts 
• 100% Fine Jersey cotton, combed for softness and comfort 
• Flattering, stylish fit on virtually any body type

SIZES

• Available in S,M,L,XL and XXL

COLORS

• available in Black or White 


THE STORY BEHIND THE LOGO

Tree changed BMX forever by introducing the Original sprocket, the first 7075 T6 aircraft grade aluminum sprocket that was indestructible. The material is 90% stronger than 6061 so it made bending and breaking sprockets a thing of the past.  Also the design has the classic look that has been iconized over the years to just stand for BMX.

name: Slim Ergo Seat
description:
REASON FOR MAKING IT:

I was never really satisfied with the comfort of seats that are available. So I decided to design my own.

WHY IT WAS MADE THIS WAY:

Just putting more foam on a seat doesn’t make it feel better. This seat was designed and contoured to be as comfortable as possible by creating this great ergonomic shape.

SPECS:

Micro Fiber Cover
Utilizes Patented Pivotal Technology
Hollow 6mm Allen Bolt
Ergonomically designed

COLOR:

Black,White & Brown

WEIGHT:

9.7oz/272g

name: Fat Ergo Seats
description: SPECS • Grippy Micro Fiber Kelvar Cover • Utilizes Patented Pivotal Technology • Hollow 6mm Allen Bolt • Ergonomically designed COLORS • Black, Gray, & Brown WEIGHT • To Be Announced WHY MAKE THIS PART? I was never really satisfied with the comfort of pivotal seats that are available. So I decided to design my own. First we made the Thin Ergo seat because I think the rise in fat seat popularity is partly because people wanted a more comfortable seat. So the logic is just make the foam thicker. But just putting more foam on a seat doesn’t make it feel better if it’s the wrong shape. HOW IS THIS PART DESIGNED SO THAT IT SOLVES THOSE ISSUES? AND WHAT OTHER IMPOVEMENTS HAVE BEEN MADE? We decided that if we could make a thin seat more comfortable then we could make a fat seat even more comfortable. The Fat Ergo seat has custom designed foam to be the perfect shape. It is ergonomically contoured to be as comfortable as possible. Watch the video to see the work that went in to getting the shape just right. The micro fiber Kevlar cover is a really grippy seat material that helps in holding the seat between your legs during barspins. -Sam Schulte Designer/Owner

description:
Issue-Anodized slightly lighter color blue than the rest

name: Sale 33t/36t Sprockets!
description: It's time to bring back the big gears, so we're giving you a sweet deal on all of our current 33t/36t sprockets! Here it is: HT-4130 sprockets for $34.99 (normally 44.99) Lite sprockets for $58.88 (normally $109.99) AVAILABLE IN SPLINE DRIVE ONLY!

name: USA Sprockets!
description: We found a few Lite sprockets recently in our office from a few years back. All of these bad boys were made in the United States, and are the last of their kind for now. 24t bolt drive and 36t spline drive only! 5/16" thick 7075 T6 aluminum Heat Treated insert for 3/4" spindle cranks 1/8" wide teeth COLORS: Black WEIGHTS: 24T - 2.5oz. 36T - 4.9oz.

name: Lite Spline Drive Sprocket
description:
REASON FOR MAKING IT:

I wanted an extra light sprocket that did not have to be babied. 

WHY IT WAS MADE THIS WAY:

This design is actually a morph from the original Tree sprocket. We enlarged the holes and got rid of unneeded material, which gives it a very impressive strength to weight ratio. It is made of 5/16" thick 7075 t6 aluminum.

Strength: 

I designed this sprocket from the idea of the structure of the bike wheel has a hub, spokes, and a rim. I used our 3D drawing program where we can actually test the sprocket strength on the computer. This allows us to make a very high tech sprocket with a tremendously high strength to weight ratio. We have designed the spokes of this sprocket to be tapered and I-beam shaped. This makes the best use of the material used to form the bridgework of the sprocket. Every single detail has been thoroughly thought out. Many all nighters have put into designing this thing.

Teeth: 

These teeth have been modeled after the tooth shape used for industrial machinery. In industrial situations this engineered tooth shape keeps machinery running quietly and smoothly at very high RPM's. For BMX it makes it the smoothest running sprocket. Also the teeth are made tall to prevent the chain from derailing.


18T, 20T, 22T - (made for flatland with 3/32" teeth)

22T, 23T, 24T, 25T, 26T, 27T, 28T, 29T, 30T, 33T, 36T, 37T, 39T, 41T, and 44T - (with 1/8" teeth)


5/16" thick 7075 T6 aluminum
Heat Treated drive splined insert for 3/4" spindle cranks
1/8" wide teeth
COLORS - Black or Raw

WEIGHT - 18T - 1.6oz. - (3/32" teeth, flatland)
WEIGHT - 20T - 1.8oz. - (3/32" teeth, flatland)
WEIGHT - 22T - 2.1oz. - (3/32" teeth, flatland)
WEIGHT - 22T - 2.2oz.
WEIGHT - 23T - 2.3oz.
WEIGHT - 24T - 2.5oz.
WEIGHT - 25T - 2.6oz.
WEIGHT - 26T - 2.6oz.
WEIGHT - 27T - 2.9oz.
WEIGHT - 28T - 3.0oz.
WEIGHT - 29T - 3.3oz.
WEIGHT - 33T - 4.2oz.
WEIGHT - 36T - 4.9oz.

STRENGTH:

name: 15/16" Bore Tree Lite sprocket
description:
Custom 15/16" sprockets made to order!

We will custom bore your Tree sprocket to 15/16" to fit Odyssey cranks!  Our bolt drive sprockets come with a 22mm bore with a 19mm hat washer for a perfect fit on most cranks out there.  Odyssey cranks, Wombolt/Twombolt/Thunerbolt, require a slightly larger 15/16" bore. If you have Odyssey cranks  and want to run a Tree Lite or Original sprocket we will bore your Lite or Original sprocket to fit.

name: Original Spline Drive Sprocket
description:
REASON FOR MAKING IT:

We are reintroducing this sprocket after lots of public demand. This is the sprocket that changed the BMX sprocket market and is currently the strongest sprocket available! 

WHY IT WAS MADE THIS WAY:

It has 5 different crank arm bolt positions to help extent the life of the sprocket. The sprocket is machined in a way that removes material from the triangle shaped holes that is not needed and leaves the material necessary to form a structure of high strength to weight. Classic looking design has a timeless appeal.

SPECS:

Made of ¼” thick 7075 t6 aluminum 
             
-Uses a heat treated steel insert that is splined for 48 spline for ¾” spindle cranks No need for the sprocket bolt! 
-1/8” wide teeth

WEIGHT:
2.7oz/76g   w/ spacer

Size - 25t, 28t, 30t
25t Spline drive - 2.7oz/76g   w/ spacer

name: Original Bolt Drive Sprocket
description:
REASON FOR MAKING IT:

We are reintroducing this sprocket after lots of public demand. This is the sprocket that changed the BMX sprocket market and is currently the strongest sprocket available! 

WHY IT WAS MADE THIS WAY:

It has 5 different crank arm bolt positions to help extent the life of the sprocket. The sprocket is machined in a way that removes material from the triangle shaped holes that is not needed and leaves the material necessary to form a structure of high strength to weight. Classic looking design has a timeless appeal.

SPECS:

Made of ¼” thick 7075 t6 aluminum 
             
Sprocket is made in two versions:

-22mm center hole comes with a steel adapter for use on ¾”(19mm) spindles.
-1/8” wide teeth

 SIZES:

25t, 28t, 30t

WEIGHT:

25t Bolt drive - 2.4oz/67g  w/out spacer

Odyssey cranks, Wombolt/Twombolt/Thunerbolt, require a slightly larger 15/16" bore. name: 4130 HT-V2 Bolt Drive Sprocket
description: REASON FOR MAKING IT: To be a low cost, but high-quality sprocket. It’s the first in a new line of high quality Tree products being produced at affordable prices to riders by designing parts in unique ways that will cost less to manufacture. WHY IT WAS MADE THIS WAY: We chose to use 4140 steel because it is a less expensive material when compared to 7075 aluminum. Plus, it's made from thinner stock and takes less time to machine. This sprocket is more beefed up than the previous version to ensure it can take anything you can throw at it, all while keeping it's own unique look. Made of Heatreated 4130 Chromoly Steel - 22mm center hole - Comes with a steel adapter for use on ¾”(19mm) spindles. - 3/32” wide teeth Sizes - Bolt Drive 25t, 28t, 30t Color - Black or Raw Weight: 25t - 2.5oz/70g w/out spacer

name: 4130 HT-V2 Spline Drive Sprocket
description: REASON FOR MAKING IT: To be a low cost, but high-quality sprocket. It’s the first in a new line of high quality Tree products being produced at affordable prices to riders by designing parts in unique ways that will cost less to manufacture. WHY IT WAS MADE THIS WAY: We chose to use 4140 steel because it is a less expensive material when compared to 7075 aluminum. It also allows the spline drive system to be one solid piece with the sprocket body, which cuts down on the overall cost. Plus, it's made from thinner stock and takes less time to machine. This sprocket is more beefed up than the previous version to ensure it can take anything you can throw at it, all while keeping it's own unique look. Made of Heatreated 4130 Chromoly Steel - Built in spline drive center hole for use on ¾”(19mm) spindles. - 3/32” wide teeth Sizes - 25t, 28t, 30t Color - Black or Raw Weight: 25t - 2.5oz/70g

name: Straight Pull Rear Hub
description:
REASON FOR MAKING IT:

We wanted to create a hub that has a low friction bearing design, using a straight pull spoke design, creating one of the strongest and stiffest wheels in BMX.

WHY IT WAS MADE THIS WAY:

We chose straight pull spokes because they are stronger and stiffer than normal spokes.

We chose to lace the hub 5 cross because it made it possible to assemble the wheel and it has the same strength of a 4 cross which is the strongest lacing pattern for a 36 hole wheel. It’s very easy to lace the wheel, just push the spoke into the hub and the spoke goes right to the corresponding hole in the rim.

The hub has a unique thread design that allows the bolts to thread directly into the 7075 -T6 aluminum axle and prevent cross threading in the axle. Our tests have shown that the aluminum threads are very strong so that under high torque the bolt will pull apart before the threads strip out. The hub has unique bearing system that eliminates side load pressure and allows for a very small amount of play so there is no resistance to rolling.

SPECS:

7075-T6 aluminum hub shell
Uses a ceramic plain bearing instead of ball bearings
14mm axle bolts with a 17mm heat treated steel internal axle.
Comes with integral hub guard to protect the spoke flange
3/8 square head for use directly with ratchet
Designed specifically for use with Tree Twigs n’ Berries straight pull spokes
Must be laced 5 cross only
Available in RHD or LHD

SIZES:

36 hole only

COLOR:

Black, Raw, Gold, Blue, Red

WEIGHT:

14oz /392g

name: Straight Pull 3/8" Rear Hub
description:
REASON FOR MAKING IT:

After a lot of public demand we decided to offer the Tree hub in 2 new formats to fulfill certain rider’s needs. We now offer a 3/8” axle bolt version for peg less street riders, and we built one of the strongest and stiffest wheels for BMX racing using the straight pull spoke design.

SPECS:

Same specs as regular Tree rear hub unless noted.
3/8 axle bolts with a 17mm 7075 aluminum internal axle.
16ft thread on cog on race version

SIZE:

36 hole 3/8" axle bolts
Available in: 9ft. freestyle or 16ft racing

COLOR:

Black, Gold, Red, Blue, Silver

WEIGHT:

16t = 13.6oz / 381g
9t = 12.9oz / 361g

name: Straight Pull Front Hub
description:
REASON FOR MAKING IT:

We wanted to create a hub that has a low friction bearing design, using a straight pull spoke design, creating one of the strongest and stiffest wheels in BMX.

WHY IT WAS MADE THIS WAY:

We chose straight pull spokes because they are stronger and stiffer than normal spokes. We chose to lace the hub 5 cross because it made it possible to assemble a 36 hole straight pull wheel and it has the same strength of a 4 cross, which is the strongest lacing pattern for a 36 hole wheel. It’s very easy to lace the wheel, just push the spoke into the hub and the spoke goes right to the corresponding hole in the rim.

The hub has a unique thread design that allows the bolts to thread directly into the 7075 -T6 aluminum axle and prevent cross threading in the axle. Our tests have shown that the aluminum threads are very strong so that under high torque the bolt will pull apart before the threads strip out. The hub has unique bearing system that eliminates side load pressure and allows for a very small amount of play so there is no resistance to rolling.

SPECS:

6061-T6 aluminum hub shell
3/8 axle bolts with a 17mm 7075 aluminum internal axle.
Comes with integral hub guard to protect the spoke flange
3/8 square head for use directly with ratchet
Designed specifically for use with Tree Twigs n’ Berries straight pull spokes
Has to be laced 5 cross pattern only

SIZE:

36 hole only

COLORS:

Black,Red,Gold,Blue, & Silver

WEIGHT:

8.3oz /232g

name: Tree Barends
description:
Reason for making it:

I wanted to make barends that would securely stay inside my handlebars and not fall out.

Why it was made this way:

The heads of the barends are machined the same as the Tree headset cap so it matches with the headset cap. The outside diameter of the barends match the grips diameter, this reduces the amount of dirt that can get under the grips. The barend is made of 7075 T6 aluminum and is a simple bolt that can be tightened down with a 6mm Allen key, very tight, so they will not fall out while riding.

Use instructions:

One size fits most. Barends can be used on handlebars with .065” thick ends, but please be cautious on multi-butted bars if they are cut down more than ½” width from original width because the tubing is thinner in the grip section of the handlebar. In this area the ID is too big for the tap to cut threads into it and the barend will strip out and be useless. Sorry, Sunday bikes handlebars are not compatible with Tree Barends.

To use these barends your handlebars must have a 20 x 1.5mm threads inside of the end of the bar. Since only Tree bars come with threading, all other bars will need to be tapped out. All mailorders and some bike shops will have the tap to thread your bars with. If your local bikeshop does not have the tap necessary to tap your handlebars please ask them to contact us to so they can get one. The most common way of getting the bars tapped out when ordering through mailorder is when purchasing a new set. But for a local bikeshop it is much easier to show up and have your current bars tapped as well as have a brand new pair tapped.

Specs.
    
    7075 T6 Aluminum
    Threaded to prevent falling out
    COLORS - Black

    20 x 1.5mm thread into handlebar
    6mm allen wrench hole
    Head diameter is the same diameter as the grip
    WEIGHT - 1.1oz.

name: Moto Bars
description: Reason for making it: We made the Moto bars because we wanted an all around bar with the more classic styling of bigger boxed bars that could handle the abuse of street, the boost of the trails, and anything in between. We made these bars with the same sweep options as all of our previous handlebars, but with three different height and width options so you can find the ones that best fit your set up in todays world of growing bar sizes and refined set ups. Why it was made this way: Whether you want to stack your bar height to the moon, or want to maintain your current height but loose the spacers for a cleaner looking set up we make three sizes of the Moto bars to fit your needs. The bars are also wider as they grow taller to meet the needs for wider bars which provide more stability and leverage. The bigger box shape like their name pays homage to the large box styles of BMX bars early on. While the box shape is larger and the height and width come in three sizes, we managed to maintain our signature large radius bends, which have been present since our first set of Hot Bars in 2005; these larger radius bends add to the over all strength of the bar. Specs: -11 butted -Made of post weld heat treated chromoly -Threaded for use with Tree bar ends, but works with any bar end Sizes: - 8.5"tall/28.5wide, 9"tall/29.5"wide, 9.5"tall/30"wide - 12˚ backsweep - 1˚ or 4˚ upsweep Color: Black or Matte Clear Weight: 8.5" - 28.2oz 9" - 28.7oz 9.5" - 29.7oz

name: Collet Stem: Drop Load
description:
SPECS
•	Made of 7075 T6 CNC machined aluminum 
•	collet steertube clamp
•	smooth and compact design
•	made by high tech 3D surface contour CNC machining

SIZE
•	Length 53mm
•	Rise: 8.4mm
•	Stack height 30mm

COLORS 
•	Black, Blue, Red, Gold, or Raw 

WEIGHT
•	8.1oz/229g 



WHY MAKE THIS PART?

I wanted to create a knee friendly stem that worked well and did not damage the steertube on your forks.



HOW IS THIS PART DESIGNED SO THAT IT SOLVES THOSE ISSUES? 
AND WHAT OTHER IMPROVEMENTS HAVE BEEN MADE?
 
This stem is designed using a collet compression wedge device. When the bolts are tightened the top and bottom of the stem come closer together thus compressing the collet piece around the fork. 
Since the stem is a unique design it’s important to read the instructions provided so that the stem is installed correctly. 
By putting the bolts in the middle of the stem I was able to create large radiuses that make this stem very knee friendly.   

-Sam Schulte Designer/Owner


Marked down 64%!! normally $84.99
To make room for new inventory.

name: H10 Headset Cap Bolt
description:
REASON FOR MAKING IT:

Originally I designed the product to offer an alternative to the big sharp bolts that came standard on forks several years ago. But since that time companies that make forks realized that their team riders using our headset caps on their bikes. So most fork makers are now selling their forks with a bolt that is highly influence by our design. Yet many of them are poor imitations and many people need to replace their stock bolt with a Tree headset cap bolt.

WHY IT WAS MADE THIS WAY:

Looking Good! Most original bolts that come with forks are big and ugly so we wanted to make something that was nice to look at. When your bike looks nice it makes you want to ride it.

STRENGTH TESTS:

These are made of 7075 aluminum because this grade is the best! These bolts have gone under extensive testing to make sure they do not break or strip out. In this test we used a torque dial wrench to find out at what point the each bolt fails. All the Tree bolts withstood 2 to 6 times the torque of 15 lb/ft, which is the point of a headset being so tight that it does not spin freely. That's tighter than anyone would want their headset to be. Generally people usually tighten their headset to 5 lb/ft which means that there is no concern of them breaking. Our headset caps are guaranteed against breaking.

HEX KEY:

 ¼” stepped to a 6mm Allen Key hole. This allows the use of either a standard or a metric Allen key for the same bolt. The reason for this was to make adjusting the headset tension less of a hassle, since the bolt it's replacing is usually something that requires a crescent wrench. Our bolt allows the use of just one tool whether you have a stem with ¼" or 6mm bolts. This is all in the pursuit of having fewer tools to lug around. The Allen key hole can withstand 55 lb/ft before distorting when the tool is properly seated.

SIZES:

H10, H18, H24, and H25.

H10: Fits Fit, S&M, Standard, and the freestyle star nut.

H18: Fits Failure ('06 and on), Macneil, Odyssey ('06 and earlier), Snafu, Cult Sect Fork, Sunday morning 1 & night 1 forks, We The People forks ('03 to '07).

H24: FIts Black Label slimfast, Demolition concorde, Odyssey forks ('07 and newer), Primo, WTP ('08 & on),Sunday morning 2 & night 2 forks, Blue Six Bolo forks.

H25: Fits BSD, Colony, Eastern, Fly Bikes, Federal, Hoffman, Kink, Nitrous afterburner, Premium taper lite, Shadow Conspiracy, Sputnic, Stolen, Subrosa, United, Verde, Volume feather weight & genesis forks, Amity RD forks, and Bone Deth Bottom Feeder forks.


7075 T6 aluminum
¼" stepped to a 6mm universal allen key hole
Usually lighter than stock headset cap bolts
COLORS - Black, Blue, Gold, Raw, Red


WEIGHT - H10 - .39oz.
WEIGHT - H18 - .1oz.
WEIGHT - H24 - .6oz.
WEIGHT - H25 - .6oz.

name: Balsa Pegs
description: REASON FOR MAKING IT: Pat at Flatland Fuel and I were talking about pegs and he suggested that we make some. So we talked about every aspect of the design, and the peg was designed between the both of us. WHY THEY WERE MADE THIS WAY: These pegs are designed for Flatland only. Grinding with these pegs will cause them to wear out very fast. They are internally butted to maximize strength to weight. Thick lip on the end of the peg for long life. Half inch length of smooth finish and big radius on the end of peg for smooth pivoting. SPECS: Made of full 7075 t6 aluminum Flatland only peg Diamond knurled finish Internally butted save weight and thick on the end for durability 3/8" axle hole only 1.5” or 1.75” dia x 4.5” long Black, Red, Gold, Green, Blue, and Raw 1.5” dia. = 73g/ 2.6oz each 1.75” dia. = 87g/ 3.1oz each Note: These pegs are sold in sets of two.

name: Trick Sticks
description:
REASON FOR MAKING IT:

I’ve been running titanium pegs because they are light, but they grind very slow and leave a material on the coping that just makes the coping slower and slower. We wanted to ride pegs that were light like ti but faster grinding.

WHY IT WAS MADE THIS WAY:

These pegs are made for skatepark and very light street such as hand rails and stalls on ledges. Grinding on rough ledges will wear these pegs out very fast so if you like to grind cement ledges these pegs may not be for you.

Note: these pegs do not grind as fast as heatreated steel pegs but they are faster than titanium.


They are internally butted to maximize strength to weight.

These aluminum pegs grind faster than titanium on steel. Just to clear any confusion, aluminum is not inherently a high friction material. Everyone has had there experience of aluminum railing being very slow, but aluminum railing is made of a very soft corrosion resistant grade. Like all metals, the higher quality grades are harder and have a lower friction coefficient. Skateboard trucks have always been made of aluminum.

SPECS:

Sold individually
Made of full 7075 t6 aluminum
Skatepark specific peg

1.375"dia x 4" long

Black, Red, Gold, Green, Blue, and Silver

3.4oz/95g each

Sold individually

name: Stunt Stumps
description:
REASON FOR MAKING IT:

To make pegs that are for hardcore street riding but didn't weigh a ton.

WHY IT WAS MADE THIS WAY:

They are internally butted and offset machined to maximize strength to weight. The pegs are thicker on one side so that it saves weight while having a grind life that is same as pegs that would be 3.5oz more. Anti roll bolts keep the peg in place so that only the thick side is ground on.

SPECS:

Available with 3/8" or 14mm hole
Made of SCM 415 Steel
Offset machined design
For street riding or anything you can dish out.
COLORS - Black, White, Red, and Raw
Limited Edition: Woodgrain

1.375" dia x 4" long
WEIGHT - 5.4oz. each

Sold individually

name: Tree Trucker Hat
description: Reason for making it: This product was made to be an instant cure to bed head. Forget combing or washing your hair just pop this dude on your head and you’ll be ready to meet the day with confidence! •Classic OTTO Brand Hat •Terry Cloth Rim Sweat Guard •One Size Fits All Color:Black

options.name: Black Only One Size Fits All

name: Unite
description:
"I asked Eben Fischer to create the art for this shirt to show difference between the desire to gain for the self alone and the desire to gain for all. And how the two ways play out. It seems that sometimes people try to put other people down in an attempt to bring themselves up. But I think if we put someone down were going down with them. If a rich man put the whole world into poverty because he took all the money. He would be surrounded by only poverty so he too would be living in poverty. I think if we try to bring each other up we truly will be brought up ourselves. If we think greatly of others and believe in them we will be surrounded greatness and happiness." - Sam Schulte

SPECS

  • Made and screen-printed in the USA
  • Printed on American Apparel t-shirts
  • 100% Fine Jersey cotton, combed for softness and comfort
  • Flattering, stylish fit on virtually any body type
  • COLORS - Silver

name: Eben Fischer Signature Shirt
description:
I originally created a bike monster for a tattoo. I liked the way it worked out, so I decided to work on a series of bike monster pieces. A little project to work on in my free time. I've always had fun riding front brakes, so I figured this guy would work good for my signature shirt. The original is colored pencil on a 14" by 17" heavyweight bristol.

-Eben

SPECS

  • Made and screen-printed in the USA
  • Printed on American Apparel t-shirts
  • 100% Fine Jersey cotton, combed for softness and comfort
  • Flattering, stylish fit on virtually any body type
  • COLORS - Asphalt

name: Tree Veggie Van shirt (Clint Reynolds signature)
description:
SPECS

• Printed on Next Level t-shirts 
• 35% Fine Jersey cotton / 65% polyester, combed for softness and comfort 
• Flattering, stylish fit on virtually any body type

SIZES

• Available in S,M,L,XL and XXL

COLORS

• Sage 


THE STORY BEHIND THE LOGO

“When I first set eyes on Betty (Clint’s van that runs on vegetable oil) it was love at first site. I knew she had to be mine. I talked with her owner and we worked out a deal. I would do some welding work he needed done and in return the van was mine. I’ve had her for over six years now and In that span of that time I've had over 3 different motors in her, traveled across the country numerous times, and burned thousands of gallons of vegetable oil. She's been through a lot to say the least. It's like a second home to me. I chose this drawing of the grill of my van for a signature shirt because it's a big part of my life and my travels.”
- Clint Reynolds

name: Swords Thermal
description:
The Sword shirt is the result of several different ideas I had coming together. I wanted to create a shirt that was more than just an image printed on a shirt. I wanted it to be a symbol for something positive, and i wanted it to look cool and strong at the same time. A lot of my influence comes from the principles of sacred geometry, and from the ideas of self discovery and self transformation found in Alchemy. There are three swords, three really is the magic number, but anyway, each of the swords is laid out 30 degrees apart from the next, this is according to the three main intersecting lines found in the Flower of Life Geometric Pattern. The sword is a symbol of clarity, it cuts through darkness and illusion to reveal more of the truth to us and help us grow as individuals. Bringing all these ideas together accomplished my goals with the shirt, it has a message, and at the very least, swords are cool looking. I laid out the design and asked Eben Fischer to draw it up, and there you have it, The Sword shirt. -Nathan

SPECS

  • Made and screen-printed in the USA
  • Printed on American Apparel Baby Rib Thermal
  • 100% Fine Jersey cotton, combed for softness and comfort
  • Flattering, stylish fit on virtually any body type
  • COLORS - Steel Grey

description:
Replacement bolts. The sizes are 14x1.0 or 14x1.25. These bolts are a way to lighten your bike. Can be used in several ways. As single for non-peg side, a pair for pegless rides, and as a pair for skatepark peg use.

  • 14x1.25mm pitch: first & second run Tree rear hubs, G Sport Ratchet Hub
  • We made 2 different axle threads during the first run of hubs. So it is necessary to measure the thread pitch on your Tree hub to ensure the correct bolts when buying.
  • 3/8" square hole for use directly with ratchet, no need to find the right socket when in a bind.
  • Made of 7075 t6 aluminum
  • For light peg and pegless use
  • .7oz ea. / .8oz lighter than stock steel bolt

name: Tree Logo Sticker
description: It's the Tree logo printed on a vinyl sticker!
